lead_paragraph: The International Equestrian Federation has voted in favor of Olympic format changes that will allow more countries to compete at the 2020 Tokyo Games.

headline.print_headline: Equestrian Body Backs Format Changes for 2020 Tokyo Games
headline.main: Equestrian Body Backs Format Changes for 2020 Tokyo Games
